MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Java,Linux,Mac OS X,Unix,Win2000,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,WinServer,WinVista,WinVista x64,WinXP
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: This is a bug fix release

English.Keywords: owasp zap security proxy webappsec pentest
English.Char_Desc_45: An easy to use pentest tool for webapps
English.Char_Desc_80: An easy to use penetration testing tool for finding vulnerabilities in web apps
English.Char_Desc_250: OWASP ZAP: An easy to use integrated penetration testing tool for finding vulnerabilities in web applications.
English.Char_Desc_450:
The OWASP Zed Attack Proxy (ZAP) is an easy to use integrated penetration testing tool for finding vulnerabilities in web applications.
It is designed to be used by people with a wide range of security experience and as such is ideal for developers and functional testers who are new to penetration testing as well as being a useful addition to an experienced pen testers toolbox.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
The OWASP Zed Attack Proxy (ZAP) is an easy to use integrated penetration testing tool for finding vulnerabilities in web applications.
It is designed to be used by people with a wide range of security experience and as such is ideal for developers and functional testers who are new to penetration testing as well as being a useful addition to an experienced pen testers toolbox.
